description: This file contains implementation of the DataElement class and related LinkedDataElement class in the WPEFramework::Core namespace. It includes functions for CRC32 checksum calculation and buffer management, indicating its role in data handling and integrity within the core library.

classes.name: DataElement
classes.description: Provides CRC32 checksum calculation over a data buffer.

classes.name: LinkedDataElement
classes.description: Manages linked list of data buffers with methods for getting/setting buffers and copying data between linked elements.

methods.name: DataElement::CRC32
methods.description: Calculates CRC32 checksum over a specified buffer segment starting from a given offset.

methods.name: LinkedDataElement::GetBuffer
methods.description: Reads a specified amount of data from the linked buffer chain into a provided buffer.

methods.name: LinkedDataElement::SetBuffer
methods.description: Writes a specified amount of data into the linked buffer chain from a provided buffer.

methods.name: LinkedDataElement::Copy
methods.description: Copies data from another linked data element into this one, starting at a given offset.

methods.name: uint32_t CRC32(const uint64_t offset,const uint64_t size) const
uint64_t Copy(const uint64_t offset,const LinkedDataElement & copy)
void GetBuffer(uint64_t offset,uint32_t size,uint8_t * buffer) const
void SetBuffer(uint64_t offset,uint32_t size,const uint8_t * buffer)

ctags.name: CRC32
ctags.pattern: /^    uint32_t DataElement::CRC32(const uint64_t offset, const uint64_t size) const$/

ctags.name: Copy
ctags.pattern: /^    uint64_t LinkedDataElement::Copy(const uint64_t offset, const LinkedDataElement& copy)$/

ctags.name: GetBuffer
ctags.pattern: /^    void LinkedDataElement::GetBuffer(uint64_t offset, uint32_t size, uint8_t* buffer) const$/

ctags.name: SetBuffer
ctags.pattern: /^    void LinkedDataElement::SetBuffer(uint64_t offset, uint32_t size, const uint8_t* buffer)$/
